verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that while <S%G1722><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> was at Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> having passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> the upper <S%G510><s%> country <S%G3313><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

and he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Did you receive <S%G2983><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> when you believed <S%G4100><s%>?" And they [said] to him, "No, <S%G3761><s%> we have not even <S%G3761><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> there is a Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>"
And he said, <S%G3004><s%> "Into what <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> were you baptized <S%G907><s%>?" And they said, <S%G3004><s%> "Into John's baptism. <S%G908><s%>"

And Paul <S%G3972><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "John <S%G2491><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance, <S%G3341><s%> telling <S%G3004><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> to believe <S%G4100><s%> in Him who was coming <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> him, that is, in Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>"
And when they heard <S%G191><s%> this, they were baptized <S%G907><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And when Paul <S%G3972><s%> had laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> upon them, the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> on them, and they [began] speaking <S%G2980><s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%> and prophesying. <S%G4395><s%>
And there were in all <S%G3956><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> men. <S%G435><s%>

And he entered <S%G1525><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> and continued speaking <S%G3955><s%> out boldly <S%G3955><s%> for three <S%G5140><s%> months, <S%G3376><s%> reasoning <S%G1256><s%> and persuading <S%G3982><s%> [them] about <S%G4012><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But when <S%G5613><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> were becoming <S%G4645><s%> hardened <S%G4645><s%> and disobedient, <S%G544><s%> speaking <S%G2551><s%> evil <S%G2551><s%> of the Way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the multitude, <S%G4128><s%> he withdrew <S%G868><s%> from them and took <S%G873><s%> away <S%G873><s%> the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> reasoning <S%G1256><s%> daily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> in the school <S%G4981><s%> of Tyrannus. <S%G5181><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> took <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> for two <S%G1417><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> who lived <S%G2730><s%> in Asia <S%G773><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> and Greeks. <S%G1672><s%>
And God <S%G2316><s%> was performing <S%G4160><s%> extraordinary <S%G5177><s%> miracles <S%G1411><s%> by the hands <S%G5495><s%> of Paul, <S%G3972><s%>

so <S%G5620><s%> that handkerchiefs <S%G4676><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> aprons <S%G4612><s%> were even <S%G2532><s%> carried <S%G667><s%> from his body <S%G5559><s%> to the sick, <S%G770><s%> and the diseases <S%G3554><s%> left <S%G525><s%> them and the evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> went <S%G1607><s%> out.

But also <S%G2532><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the Jewish <S%G2453><s%> exorcists, <S%G1845><s%> who went <S%G4022><s%> from place <S%G4022><s%> to place, <S%G4022><s%> attempted <S%G2021><s%> to name <S%G3687><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> the evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I adjure <S%G3726><s%> you by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> preaches. <S%G2784><s%>"
And seven <S%G2033><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of one <S%G5100><s%> Sceva, <S%G4630><s%> a Jewish <S%G2453><s%> chief <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> were doing <S%G4160><s%> this. <S%G3778><s%>

And the evil <S%G4190><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I recognize <S%G1097><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and I know <S%G1987><s%> about <S%G1987><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> but who <S%G5101><s%> are you?"

And the man, <S%G444><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> was the evil <S%G4190><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> leaped <S%G2177><s%> on them and subdued <S%G2634><s%> all <S%G297><s%> of them and overpowered <S%G2480><s%> them, so <S%G5620><s%> that they fled <S%G1628><s%> out of that house <S%G3624><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%> and wounded. <S%G5135><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> to all, <S%G3956><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> and Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> who lived <S%G2730><s%> in Ephesus; <S%G2181><s%> and fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> upon them all <S%G3956><s%> and the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was being magnified. <S%G3170><s%>

Many <S%G4183><s%> also <S%G5037><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who had believed <S%G4100><s%> kept coming, <S%G2064><s%> confessing <S%G1843><s%> and disclosing <S%G312><s%> their practices. <S%G4234><s%>

And many <S%G2425><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who practiced <S%G4238><s%> magic <S%G4021><s%> brought <S%G4851><s%> their books <S%G976><s%> together <S%G4851><s%> and [began] burning <S%G2618><s%> them in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of all; <S%G3956><s%> and they counted <S%G4860><s%> up the price <S%G5092><s%> of them and found <S%G2147><s%> it fifty <S%G3461><s%> <S%G4002><s%> thousand <S%G3461><s%> pieces <S%G694><s%> of silver. <S%G694><s%>
So <S%G3779><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> was growing <S%G837><s%> mightily <S%G2904><s%> and prevailing. <S%G2480><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G5613><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> were finished, <S%G4137><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> purposed <S%G5087><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> after he had passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> and Achaia, <S%G882><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "After <S%G3326><s%> I have been <S%G1096><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> I must <S%G1163><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G3708><s%> Rome. <S%G4516><s%>"

And having sent <S%G649><s%> into Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who ministered <S%G1247><s%> to him, Timothy <S%G5095><s%> and Erastus, <S%G2037><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> stayed <S%G1907><s%> in Asia <S%G773><s%> for a while. <S%G5550><s%>
And about <S%G2596><s%> that time <S%G2540><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> small <S%G3641><s%> disturbance <S%G5017><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the Way. <S%G3598><s%>

For a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Demetrius, <S%G1216><s%> a silversmith, <S%G695><s%> who made <S%G4160><s%> silver <S%G693><s%> shrines <S%G3485><s%> of Artemis, <S%G735><s%> was bringing <S%G3930><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> little <S%G3641><s%> business <S%G2039><s%> to the craftsmen; <S%G5079><s%>

these <S%G3739><s%> he gathered <S%G4867><s%> together <S%G4867><s%> with the workmen <S%G2040><s%> of similar <S%G5108><s%> [trades,] and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Men, <S%G435><s%> you know <S%G1987><s%> that our prosperity <S%G2142><s%> depends <S%G1510><s%> <S%G1537><s%> upon this <S%G3778><s%> business. <S%G2039><s%>

"And you see <S%G2334><s%> and hear <S%G191><s%> that not only <S%G3440><s%> in Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> but in almost <S%G4975><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of Asia, <S%G773><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> has persuaded <S%G3982><s%> and turned <S%G3179><s%> away <S%G3179><s%> a considerable <S%G2425><s%> number <S%G3793><s%> of people, <S%G3793><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> that gods made <S%G1096><s%> with hands <S%G5495><s%> are no <S%G3756><s%> gods <S%G2316><s%> [at all.]

"And not only <S%G3440><s%> is there danger <S%G2793><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> trade <S%G3313><s%> of ours <S%G1473><s%> fall <S%G2064><s%> into disrepute, <S%G557><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> that the temple <S%G2413><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> goddess <S%G2299><s%> Artemis <S%G735><s%> be regarded <S%G3049><s%> as worthless <S%G3762><s%> and that she whom <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> of Asia <S%G773><s%> and the world <S%G3625><s%> worship <S%G4576><s%> should <S%G3195><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> be dethroned <S%G2507><s%> from her magnificence. <S%G3168><s%>"

And when they heard <S%G191><s%> [this] and were filled <S%G4134><s%> with rage, <S%G2372><s%> they [began] crying <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Great <S%G3173><s%> is Artemis <S%G735><s%> of the Ephesians! <S%G2180><s%>"

And the city <S%G4172><s%> was filled <S%G4092><s%> with the confusion, <S%G4799><s%> and they rushed <S%G3729><s%> with one <S%G3661><s%> accord <S%G3661><s%> into the theater, <S%G2302><s%> dragging <S%G4884><s%> along <S%G4884><s%> Gaius <S%G1050><s%> and Aristarchus, <S%G708><s%> Paul's traveling <S%G4898><s%> companions <S%G4898><s%> from Macedonia. <S%G3110><s%>
And when Paul <S%G3972><s%> wanted <S%G1014><s%> to go <S%G1525><s%> into the assembly, <S%G1218><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> would not let <S%G1439><s%> him.

And also <S%G2532><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the Asiarchs <S%G775><s%> who were friends <S%G5384><s%> of his sent <S%G3992><s%> to him and repeatedly urged <S%G3870><s%> him not to venture <S%G1325><s%> <S%G1438><s%> into the theater. <S%G2302><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> some <S%G243><s%> were shouting <S%G2896><s%> one <S%G3303><s%> thing and some <S%G243><s%> another, <S%G243><s%> for the assembly <S%G1577><s%> was in confusion, <S%G4797><s%> and the majority <S%G4183><s%> did not know <S%G3609><s%> for what <S%G5101><s%> cause <S%G1752><s%> they had come <S%G4905><s%> together. <S%G4905><s%>

And some of the crowd <S%G3793><s%> concluded <S%G4822><s%> [it was] Alexander, <S%G223><s%> since the Jews <S%G2453><s%> had put <S%G4261><s%> him forward; <S%G4261><s%> and having motioned <S%G2678><s%> with his hand, <S%G5495><s%> Alexander <S%G223><s%> was intending <S%G2309><s%> to make <S%G626><s%> a defense <S%G626><s%> to the assembly. <S%G1218><s%>

But when they recognized <S%G1921><s%> that he was a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> a [single] outcry <S%G5456><s%> arose <S%G1096><s%> from them all <S%G3956><s%> as they shouted <S%G2896><s%> for about <S%G5613><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> hours, <S%G5610><s%> "Great <S%G3173><s%> is Artemis <S%G735><s%> of the Ephesians! <S%G2180><s%>"

And after quieting <S%G2687><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> the town <S%G1122><s%> clerk <S%G1122><s%> said, <S%G5346><s%> "Men <S%G435><s%> of Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is there after <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G1063><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> does not know <S%G1097><s%> that the city <S%G4172><s%> of the Ephesians <S%G2180><s%> is guardian <S%G3511><s%> of the temple <S%G3511><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> Artemis, <S%G735><s%> and of the [image] which <S%G1356><s%> fell <S%G1356><s%> down <S%G1356><s%> from heaven <S%G1356><s%>?

"Since then <S%G3767><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are undeniable <S%G368><s%> facts, <S%G368><s%> you ought <S%G7506><s%> to keep <S%G2687><s%> calm <S%G2687><s%> and to do <S%G4238><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> rash. <S%G4312><s%>

"For you have brought <S%G71><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> men <S%G435><s%> [here] who are neither <S%G3777><s%> robbers <S%G2417><s%> of temples <S%G2417><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> blasphemers <S%G987><s%> of our goddess. <S%G2299><s%>

"So <S%G3767><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Demetrius <S%G1216><s%> and the craftsmen <S%G5079><s%> who are with him have <S%G2192><s%> a complaint <S%G3056><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man, <S%G5100><s%> the courts <S%G60><s%> are in session <S%G71><s%> and proconsuls <S%G446><s%> are [available]; let them bring <S%G1458><s%> charges <S%G1458><s%> against <S%G1458><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
"But if <S%G1487><s%> you want <S%G1934><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> beyond <S%G4007><s%> this, it shall be settled <S%G1956><s%> in the lawful <S%G1772><s%> assembly. <S%G1577><s%>

"For indeed <S%G2532><s%> we are in danger <S%G2793><s%> of being accused <S%G1458><s%> of a riot <S%G4714><s%> in connection <S%G4012><s%> with today's affair, since there is no <S%G3367><s%> [real] cause <S%G159><s%> [for it]; and in this <S%G3739><s%> connection <S%G4012><s%> we shall be unable <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> to account <S%G3056><s%> <S%G591><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> disorderly <S%G4963><s%> gathering. <S%G4963><s%>"
And after saying <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> he dismissed <S%G630><s%> the assembly. <S%G1577><s%>
